EmailTemplate.name: SM-20190117-Cloud and Beyond.ES - 1a.ES 1 - HTML Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Win $500 Amazon Gift Card | State of Multicloud & Beyond Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Multicloud adoption is accelerating and AI is on the rise. How will you choose the right clouds, if any, for your business in 2019 and beyond?
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]>
Let's dig deeper together - answer this survey <[[http://bit.ly/2DhOF9h]]>and we'll share the findings in our upcoming report, "The State of Multicloud and Beyond."
This survey will take approximately 15 minutes to complete and you'll have a chance to win one of two $500 Amazon Gift Cards at the end of the survey. Regards, Megan PS. If you're ready to learn how Turbonomic can help you optimize your environment, let us know that you'd like to chat with an engineer at the end of the survey and we'll send you a $50 Amazon Gift Card after your meeting.
